channel.title: mental health on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in mental health on My New Hugo Site

item.title: It’s Time to Get Some Help
item.description: Due to increased symptoms of depression and anxiety in recent weeks, I’ve decided to try out a combination of counseling and medication. Sure, I’ve still been able to get out of bed in the morning. And I wasn’t having any serious thoughts about hurting myself. But still, I was feeling hopeless and trapped often enough that I decided it was time to seek out help. I know, I know. That’s pretty personal for a blog post for the whole internet to read!
